text: @realDonaldTrump Wow the potus is celebrating the fate of families that just lost their job, way of life, income and could possibly lose everything. Being potus is not the job for u. He takes lives as jokes. That’s why he doesn’t care about #Covid19 deaths. #MenaceIISociety
